# setBarrier()

**Instance Method**

Adds a barrier to ensure that commands executed prior to this command are complete before this command executes.

## Declaration

```swift
func setBarrier()
```

## Discussion

Set or clear barriers (as needed) before encoding the command.

## Synchronizing command execution

- **clearBarrier()**: Removes any barrier set on the command.

items.description: Removes any barrier set on the command.
